'''Classic Country Home''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Classic Country Home is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
